name: Eton Vampyres
description:
PLAY ETON VAMPYRES!

The pompous, blood sucking Vampyres of old Eton Kollege have terrorised and enslaved the people of Grande Bretagne for 600 years. The intrepid Slough Grammar schoolboy Norbert Smith has decided to rid the country of the evil Vampyre overlords of Eton and find the stolen treasure hoard to feed his starving countrymen.

Arrows to Move.

Aim and mouse click to stake a Vampyre.

Use gold keys to open doors.

Find the treasure hoard.

Good Vampyre hunting!!
